definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
Municipality of the Islands (Macau)/Concelho das Ilhas

sentences.english: Changshan archipelago is rich in resources, and the development of coastal economy is very fast.
sentences.chinese: 长山群岛资源丰富，海岛经济发展较快。

sentences.english: It covers what the apostle John saw in a vision on the Island of Patmos.
sentences.chinese: 它记录了使徒约翰在拔摩海岛所看到的异象。

sentences.english: Riverside Hotel at Sea Island in the southern part of Davao, from the international airport two kilometers.
sentences.chinese: 海岛水边饭店位于达沃的南部，离国际机场2公里。

sentences.english: Dongshanwei on the island is the Dongshan town nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 海岛上的“东山圩”就是现在的东山镇。

sentences.english: The disabled ship coasted the island, looking for a harbor.
sentences.chinese: 那艘损坏的船只是在海岛沿岸航行以找到港口。

sentences.english: He was becalmed for a whole week north of the island.
sentences.chinese: 他在海岛北面因无风而停泊了整整一周。

sentences.english: Several important factors affecting the acid dyeing of sea-island composite fiber PU synthetic leather was studied.
sentences.chinese: 海岛型锦纶超细纤维PU合成革采用酸性染料染色。

sentences.english: And every island fled away, and no mountains were to be found.
sentences.chinese: 各海岛都逃避了，众山也不见了。

sentences.english: Round many western islands have I been Which bards in fealty to Apollo hold.
sentences.chinese: 还有多少西方的海岛，歌都已使它们向阿波罗臣服。

sentences.english: The Irish began by dividing the island into North and South and setting up a distillery.
sentences.chinese: 爱尔兰人通过划分海岛成南北和设定槽坊开始了。

sentences.english: And the king Ahasuerus laid a tribute upon the land, and upon the isles of the sea.
sentences.chinese: 亚哈随鲁王使旱地，和海岛的人民都进贡。

sentences.english: The hotel assimilates with the natural habitat of the island.
sentences.chinese: 宾馆吸收了海岛独特的自然风光特征。

sentences.english: Sacrifice two islands during your upkeep phase to untap Leviathan.
sentences.chinese: 除非你牺牲两张海岛，否则海怪此回合不能攻击。

sentences.english: The two islands were 1 kilometer away from each other; most of residents on them were fishermen.
sentences.chinese: 两个海岛相距仅约1公里，岛上居民主要从事捕鱼。

sentences.english: The strategic value of the island was derisive .
sentences.chinese: 这个海岛的战略价值嘲弄。

sentences.english: For ocean views without the motion sickness, set up shop on a remote island.
sentences.chinese: 想要看海又不想晕船，就找个偏远的海岛开家小店吧。

definition: dry land (as opposed to the sea)
